sourcesContent: import React,{ Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import { CardBody } from 'reactstrap'; import { CollapsibleGroupItem } from '../../../../../../../../../constant'; import { Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionItemHeading, AccordionItemButton, AccordionItemPanel, } from 'react-accessible-accordion'; const AccordionWithOpenandCloseIcon = (props) => { console.log("PROPS! : ", props); const { experienceAndCost, disclosureVisibility, maxNumberOfApplicants, requiredRankToApply, tokensRequiredToApply } = props.data; return ( Experience Rewarded To Winner(s) {`Winner(s) of this requested hack will be rewarded approximately ${experienceAndCost.experience} XP points upon successful verification & completion of the listed gig.`} Disclosure Policy/Proceedures {"This company would like to keep any disclosures as a "}{`"${disclosureVisibility.label}"`}{". It is expected that you comply and follow procedure in order for you to recieve full compensation and experience points."} Maximum Number Of Hackers Requested {`This employer has requested ${maxNumberOfApplicants.value} hackers for this gig.`} Preferred Applicant Rank {`This employer would prefer to hire hackers in the rank/level ranges of ${requiredRankToApply.value} but you may still apply, however the employer will see you do not meet the requirements and may disregard your application.`} Tokens Required To Apply {`This gig/job costs ${tokensRequiredToApply.value} tokens to apply. You may need to purchase these from our subscription/token page if you run out of the free credits given to each account upon initial registration.`} ); } export default AccordionWithOpenandCloseIcon;
